response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this remarkable item at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant savings and an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this opportunity to fruition.", "product_price": 1100000}
